## Checklist

<!-- Ensure all items are checked before requesting review -->

### Code Quality

- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines (CONTRIBUTING.md)
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have added/updated docstrings for all public functions/classes
- [ ] I have added type hints to all new functions/methods
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors

### Testing & Validation

- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally
- [ ] Test coverage is maintained or improved
- [ ] I have tested error handling and edge cases

### Documentation

- [ ] I have updated the relevant documentation (if applicable)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if user-facing change)
- [ ] I have added/updated inline code comments where necessary
- [ ] API documentation is updated (if API changes)

### Pre-commit Checks

- [ ] `ruff check .` passes without errors
- [ ] `mypy app/` passes type checking
- [ ] `pre-commit run --all-files` passes all hooks
- [ ] No secrets or sensitive data included

### Database Changes (if applicable)

- [ ] Database migrations are included
- [ ] Migrations are reversible
- [ ] Migration tested locally
- [ ] Data migration strategy documented (if needed)
